name: unintentionally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is not intentional: I was either intentionally or unintentionally excluded from a lot of the decisions that were made. The newspaper printed information that was unintentionally misleading. See
unintentional
More examplesFewer examplesTwo civilian sites were unintentionally damaged by the bombing.Some of the businesses may be overcharging unintentionally.Patient medical records have been unintentionally posted on the internet.
